actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To permit Telluride Regional Airport to receive assistance under the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982.

summary.text: Provides that Telluride Regional Airport in Colorado shall not be denied eligibility for assistance under the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 on the basis that it is located on leased land.

titles.title: To permit Telluride Regional Airport to receive assistance under the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982.
